extendedIngredients.name: bread
extendedIngredients.originalString: Breakfast bread, such as multigrain, cinnamon swirl, walnut and raisin, even banana bread, thickly sliced
metaInformation: such as multigrain, cinnamon swirl, walnut and raisin, even banana bread, thickly sliced

extendedIngredients.aisle: Nut butters, Jams, and Honey;Health Foods
extendedIngredients.name: honey
lillet blanc
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 cup fromage blanc (or substitute some goat cheese mashed with a little cream or milk)
metaInformation: with a little cream or milk)

recipes.title: Breakfast Cheese
recipes.instructions: 1. Stir together the cheese and the honey and slather it over a few slices of bread or, alternatively, simply schmear the cheese on slices of the bread and drizzle with the honey.

steps.step: Stir together the cheese and the honey and slather it over a few slices of bread or, alternatively, simply schmear the cheese on slices of the bread and drizzle with the honey.
